job description:
Description

Atlanta, GA
Sr. Data Analyst; IDQ
Duration: 5/14/2018 - 7/27/2018

Data Profiling professional who will provide leading practices relative to data profiling and establishing data cleansing rules in support of data migration, and ongoing sustainment controls carried out by Master Data Management technology tools.
Will provide guidance and recommended approaches to staff of up to 3 for leading approaches for identifying integrity issues through profiling of data in support of Siebel to SalesForce.com migration
Wil set up tools and techniques to support efficiency in execution of work ? IDQ best practices & toolsets, templates, report finding templates, tracking of profiling scope of work
Participate in creation of deliverables and assessment outputs and presentations of findings and recommendations to client
Participate as needed in configuration of profiling cases and conducting hands-on profiling in IDQ

Skills:
Informatica Data Quality (IDQ) - advanced level required
Informatica MDM - nice to have
Siebel prior experience - a plus
SalesForce.com - nice to have

#KRT

Horizontal Integration is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. We seek to provide employment opportunities to talented, qualified candidates regardless of race, color, sex/gender including gender identity and/or expression, national origin, religion, sexual orientation, disability, marital status, citizen status, veteran status, or any other protected classification under federal, state or local law.


In addition, Horizontal Integration will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you need to request a reasonable accommodation in order to complete the application or interview process, please contact hr@horizontalintegration.com.


All applicants applying must be legally authorized to work in the country of employment.
